Page sub title

I understand your hesitation around the price. As a consumer myself, I have to work to stay within a set budget.

Page sub title

"Earlier in the call you had mentioned your ideal range to be around $XX per month.

How did you arrive at that number?

What is the maximum that you are willing to pay per month?

What coverages in here are the least important to you that I could adjust if I needed to lower the premium?"

Page sub title

Unfortunately if you want to keep all your coverage options, this is the lowest price that MetLife can offer. As a finance professional, I can objectively say that this is a good value for what you are getting.
